excerpt: The TMC5062 cDriver™ is an integrated motor driver and motion controller solution for CCTV cameras, pumps and other automated equipment applications. The device has two integrated SixPoint™ ramp controllers, microstepping indexers, the sensorless stall detection technology StallGuard2™ and the load dependent speed control DcStep™ and is intended to drive two bipolar stepper motor. The output driver blocks consists of low RDSon N-Channel power MOSFETs configured as full H-bridges to drive the motor windings. The TMC5062 is capable of driving up to 1.5A of current from each output (with proper heatsinking). TMC5062 is designed for a supply voltage of 5...20V. For high reliability requirements an Encoder interface provides feedback over the system status.
